title: Official Team of ATL & TNF preview
itunes:title: Official Team of ATL & TNF preview
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling & Gregg Rosenthal – recap the Buccaneers’ Monday night upset over the Panthers to close out Week 5. After that, they break down all the latest news from around the NFL including the 49ers naming Colin Kaepernick as their starting quarterback, and the Ravens firing offensive coordinator Marc Trestman. Plus, the heroes (finally) vote for, and select, the official “Team of ATL” before previewing Thursday’s night game between the Broncos and the Chargers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
